posts.post_title: For Sale Cycle 460 Redd Cobb  PSA 3MK  $19,900.
posts.post_content: Great looking card.  Minor "x" mark on the reverse.  PSA pop 10 all grades.  Price is net to me.  "I'll take it" supersedes any negotiation or offers.  PM for fastest response.
